title: Another Runes complaint
body:
Ok so, i spent about 30k on runes around January-march. I'm relatively still new but since im a one trick i decided that i'd be more important to put my IP to runes over champions. so basically all i wanna know is if those 3 months of me grinding were wasted and if i really wont be getting back my 30k from runes, also spent about 20k on rune pages too (3 pages) and i see that those are also going to be pretty useless next season as well... either way, are we really not getting a refund or anything back if we bought runes before May/June? If so i mean its alittle dumb, if possible it'd be nice if everyone, at least the people who bought runes this season would get a 100% refund instead of the people who bought them after the change was announced.

P.S. I'm posting this in "Help & Support" because apparently my level 30 account isn't level 7 so i can't post in gameplay.

Thanks for reading, Sinn <3

replies.body: They just released a video on this topic! Make sure to check it out http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/riot-pls-leveling-ip-and-rewards/?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier1

Our devs [announced ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/RlNQkO39-buying-runes-between-now-and-preseason)that they will be refunding all IP on runes spent since May 30th.  We don't have any additional information or updates than that currently.  Rune Pages will also still carry over to when the new system rolls out, and will still be usable.  Your profile should be sync'd now, if you'd like to share any feedback with the devs and community over at the [gameplay boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance).  I hope that helps!

thx porocles <3 and i know theres no further information on it besides that but it still makes me worry that i wasted that time for nothing, ill just have to be patient and see what riot decided on.

thx again for syncing my account though <3
you'll basically get 100 ip for basic tier 3 runes; 300 ip for quints and 1500 ip for rune pages
